text:
<@UD53A9UUR> thank you, that worked perfectly!

As a suggestion, maybe update the documentation to more accurately reflect this. From what I can see, this isn't mentioned anywhere in the docs...
Hi All - can anyone point me to the documentation for Leads API Endpoints - can see they exist but there doesn't seem to be any dedicated documentation like there is for Deals and Contacts?

Hi, I am new here so sorry if this question is not right here.
I am setting up contacts with the api and want to add subscriptions. I find the docu for the subscriptions. But is it possible to include the subscription to the create contact request (<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts>)?

that appears to be the legacy docs which we are working to merge with our more up to date docs ( <https://developers.HubSpot.com/cs/c/?cta_guid=3cb3da46-b266-4656-9138-6a3800ceeaa2&signature=AAH58kE8U676fLiyzYoyV6NvExbOTZdZfA&utm_referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fdevelopers.HubSpot.com%2Fdocs%2Fapi%2Foverview&portal_id=53&pageId=29866937483&placement_guid=7133806e-8ee1-4b08-8703-bf1806143deb&click=e7a79d50-6377-4108-bd2e-e7f710d806de&redirect_url=APefjpFS5PySPTsSevCUnzXkGmD2_Q6Ce0CIESx7o287tVNuN4x7tvmmFsGpplZ6b7J0_0gYeIXZWvSO8yxAtfyUU552efyZ7PQcGYCp54estGIeUBLuaAH2gb-K0HymwE3BAPotRQv-&hsutk=b8094a86090dcafa7b9c10bb6ebbd19c&canon=https%3A%2F%2Fdevelopers.HubSpot.com%2Fdocs%2Fapi%2Fwebhooks|check out the beta version here>! )
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/webhooks#manage-settings-via-api|i would reference these docs instead> of the legacy docs.  apologies for the confusion :disappointed:
thanks, although I've just checked that version of the documentation and it doesn't mention use of the api key either
to be more specific, I don't see any mention of the hapikey parameter on the docs
if you go to the endpoints tab, you will see the auth is developer api key
but understood that we can be more clear! will mention to the team

i havent tested it, yet, but i think you should be able to if the subscription record exists already
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts#associations|here is a reference to adding associations to a contact on creation>
there is an example as well :slightly_smiling_face:
Thank you I will try it out
let us know if it works :grin:

Hello There,
Not sure if this is the right channel for this query but I am creating a contact and meeting via HubSpot API, and I am able to see the contacts but I am not able to see the meetings associated with the contacts in the HubSpot portal. Any suggestion as to what could be wrong with this?
I am getting a successful response as well. plus when I use the api to fetch all the meetings it shows the meetings to be there but I am not able to find it on the HubSpot portal.
are you associating the meeting to the contact when you create the meeting?

HI All

```url = "<https://api.hubapi.com/email/public/v1/events>"


params = {
       
        'recipient': email,  
        'limit': 100  # Number of results per page
    }```
I am using this to get emails for a specific contact. The email is passed in the request string. However, this goes pretty slow if the email has not called before. Anywhere from 5-10 seconds. I'm assuming this is because I'm pulling all the event data. Is there a way to make this query more specific so I can only get email data? I'm willing to use any version/endpoint.

Not to mention I'm getting pretty bad timeout issues with this one.

Thanks
